website_summaries.verdict: A high-powered pressure washer with a variety of attachments so you can customize your cleaning tasks.
pros: At its highest setting, this pressure washer is capable of delivering 3,200 psi at 2.7 gpm
The Power Dial spray gun lets you quickly select the type of job you want to do, so you can have the appropriate pressure
The unit also features an ergonomic handle, an on-board cleaning tank, and a large fuel tank
cons: During shipping, oil can get into parts of the engine where it is not supposed to be and cause starting troubles until it is cleaned away

customer_reviews.title: A review from a professional
customer_reviews.text: From a professional: Pro's: - Collapsable - Lot's of attachments - Easy to start (So far) - Power settings on wand Cons - Lack of a throttle to control pressure - Front rubber foot was sheared off in box. No way to put that back on without retapping the hole - Plastic parts, like wand holster, are flimsy, and poorly secured - Not as powerful as other similar PSI models that I've used - Short hose - Wheels are terrible!!! - Chemical suction hose is pathetic, and poorly placed. It will get burned from proximity to hot engine
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing...leaking oil on delivery! Had to return it.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it arrived leaking oil in the box, and continued leaking oil on my floor after removing it from the box. Called the manufacturer and explained the issue to get feedback and they only commented that maybe an o-ring got put in wrong or something and started talking about service centers. I stopped them there to explain that I didn't buy it to have to take it to a service center, that I expected it to be free from defects on delivery. I called Amazon to return it and they were great and got me setup for a return and refund pronto...thanks Amazon, always great! Maybe I just got a lemon, but not willing to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: CrankyOldFart

customer_reviews.title: Good and strong I like the setup with all your ...
customer_reviews.text: Good and strong I like the setup with all your different nozzles and I like how easy it cranks up, the only problem is the holding tank you put your chemicals in, the machine vibrates the fluid to bubbles and it just works better if you put hose into the gallon jug or what ever jug your chemicals come in
customer_reviews.author: Chad C.

customer_reviews.title: Generac SpeedWash 7122 3200 PSI 2.7 GPM 196cc Gas Powered Pressure Washer System with Attachments
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time perching a pressure washer so I am all excited. This washer cost me a total of 415.84 after shipping to The Bahamas $830.88. I unboxed this item read the manual from cover to back twice following all the instructions and two hours later after fulling the oil and gas tanks it did not start. I took it to a local repair shop in the area and they able to get it to start it cost me an additional $65.00 but I was happy it was now starting. so I now have a growing list of todo using the pressure washer. I am pleased with it's performance
customer_reviews.author: Hubert  P.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, functions
customer_reviews.text: Got this just before winter and wanted it for cleaning the aluminum siding... It's a 2 story so reach was important. Got their 2-story nozzles and it worked OK. Took about 2 hours to do a very moldy, dirty side. It's a good start. will have to do the rest of the house in the spring... Washer works great, startup a breeze and setup and tear-down was very easy. It looks great. Siding is clean, free of mold, mildew,chalking and debris. Had priced to get this done professionally and that cost vs the cost of the washer broke even.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Works great...with one minor concern
customer_reviews.text: Really works great. Only concern is that it shakes a LOT when under load so I am worried about things working loose over time. I will probably only use it a few times a year so my concern is minor. The adjustable flow works as expected. I have not yet tried out the accessories. It had only minor oil spillage in the box (a spot about 4in x 4in unlike what some others have reported. It did smoke a LOT on first run as the oil in the exhaust burned off. The muffler cover smoked too as the paint was baked for the first time. Neither of these concerned me as I expected it in a brand new engine.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Godelfer

customer_reviews.title: Great Job!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product, and one I would highly recommend to family friends and enemy alike. This product makes pressure washing not only easy but fun to use. I pressure washed the driveway the house,back porch and even the street. The 12'' attachment sprayer worked well but not great. It left streaks between sprayer nozzles an requiring many passes than I would like. The turbo nozzle was a blast to use...pun inteded. Over all just clicking the Handel selector to choose the different settings was convenient a and easy to use. This product was easy to use and very mobil. Buy it and have a blast good job Generac!
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: I have yet to use the driveway & sidewalk attachment but everything else worked great. It was easy to follow the step by ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading the instructions carefully and completely, I found that everything worked according to the mfg. instructions. The power washer performed up to my expectations. I have yet to use the driveway & sidewalk attachment but everything else worked great. It was easy to follow the step by step instructions on everything from assembly and set up to operation and clean up. To be safe, I am going to store it during the Ohio winter indoors after stabilizing any unused fuel for storage too. I do recommend the 7122 to others who want a very good, trust worthy residential unit.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed in the lack of QC
customer_reviews.text: Received my order later than expected due to shipment delays. That being said..upon opening the box, completing the minor assembly & filling with the supplied oil I was excited to start cleaning. To my dismay.. I found that there was not one nozzle included in the box. I received all the bundled accessories that come with the 3200psi washer but no wand nozzles. very disappointed in the lack of QC.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Some of the parts seem to be really cheaply made. When I went to attach the handle, they had only drilled a hole on one side, but not on the other half. The wheels seem to fit loose and wobbly. I don’t know how long they’ll stand up. I’ve also discovered while using the included detergent holder that a lot of the detergent splashes out through the opening in the cap where the hose passes through and that wastes a lot of the detergent. Overall I’m not as satisfied with it as I’d expected. Especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this unit is a great value and can tackle any job around the house
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable power washer. All the features and attachments that were included with the GENERAC SPEED WASH SYSTEM work and perform amazingly well. Adjustable pressures at you fingertips. Four different pressure tips for driveway, siding, gutters, and automobiles. This unit is also fuel efficient, has exceptional power but has some vibration under a load, which is expected. Overall, this unit is a great value and can tackle any job around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M. Viviano Sr.

customer_reviews.title: needed a little work
customer_reviews.text: These are used units. Mine came with only some oil residue in the crankcase, but it had excess oil dripping out of the air filter. They tried to clean up the outside of the unit but it would not run right and only would start when cold. Once warmed up it would not restart until I replaced the soaked air filter. Runs great now with new filter in place. Lots of power and the adjustment at the wand it nice. The high pressure hose is kind of lightweight and could kink easy. overall I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Bunne

customer_reviews.title: Generac customer service came through for me.
customer_reviews.text: My pressure washer was delivered with leaking oil and a saturated air filter. I called Generac customer service.....navigated successfully to a human agent and explained my problem. The agent was very helpful and offered to send a replacement part at no charge. I received the new filter assembly in 2 days. Problem solved. PW started on first pull and ran flawlessly for over an hour. Restarts were just as easy. My only concern is pump related.........It sputters a bit at startup, before it eventually comes up to full pressure in a minute or so.
customer_reviews.author: A. Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Did not work, returned it. Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box it would not start. I called Generac and they walked me through all troubleshooting steps and confirmed I wasn't missing anything. They said I would have to drive to a service shop to get it looked at and they "may" cover it under warranty. That's too much effort for a brand new item so I returned it to Amazon and got a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good machine.
customer_reviews.text: This pressure washer is great, I have used it for several months. I use it to wash my cars, clean sidewalks, and wood and brick exterior house siding. This came is good packaging. The power sidewalk washer is a timesaver. Easy to switch out heads and all around versatile washer.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this. I've probably used it for 15-20 hours ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. I've probably used it for 15-20 hours already and it's kicked butt. I've cleaned my deck, washed off pavers, cleaned concrete, washed cars, etc. and it's been able to handle everything splendidly. I love being able to reduce power using the wand if needed, it really comes in handy. On top of that, it's strong enough to handle tough jobs like concrete. It always starts right up if I use the choke, isn't terribly loud, and has very sturdy fittings. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk fluke
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't start. Had to use ether to get it started. Would not stay running. It would run if you removed the air filter and soon as you set the filter back on. It would die like a dirty filter. Amazon was great though and took care of my problem 100 percent.
customer_reviews.author: TIMOTHY

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning power.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great power washer. It is much better than the one I was using. I have power washer my pool & house decks, vinyl fence and driveway, with many other projects to go. Just make sure you follow your oil change schedule, to prolong the power washer's life.
customer_reviews.author: Normand Poisson

customer_reviews.title: Great power washer!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome power washer! The quick disconnect fittings are great and the unit doesn’t hop around while in use like many other brands. We are extremely pleased with its capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This pressure washer works great. I washed the vinyl siding on my house and this worked perfectly for my need. It was very easy to put together. It shipped quickly and was exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Lance_L

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Ordered from Amazon Prime, arrived in 2 days and took 15 minutes to assemble. The unit is compact and very easy to wheel and manage. It started easily and my 14 year old son just used it to clean a large stone patio in half the time of our old electric power washer. Tried out the various tools and tips and they are powerful and provide a great variety to clean with. Anticipate using it all over outside- cars, deck, stone, siding, etc....
customer_reviews.author: L. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Best machine on the market for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Compared it to similar products that were twice the price and I think this is a superior product I've used it to wash my wood deck and I've used it on the siding on the house and also the car seems to work great with plenty of power exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Leah Haddix

customer_reviews.title: OFF TO A BAD START!!
customer_reviews.text: My pressure washer arrived on Sat. I followed the setup instructions carefully, and when done attempted to start my PW. After about 30 pulls on the rope, trying different settings, I gave up and called customer service. She walked me through some basics, all which I had done correctly, and then gave me the number for the nearest authorized repair center. Now I am waiting for Monday for the repair center to open, and see what that brings. This unit came highly recommended by someone that uses PW's for a living, and this is not my first PW. So far all I can say is am very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim B.

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: After about 3 hours of use, I really like this machine. Assembled in a couple minutes and started on 2nd pull. The unit came clean and fully drained of oil. Doesn't shake unreasonably under load on any setting as many reviews state. Floor cleaning attachment worked really well, I thought that was going to be a gimmick. Time will tell how it holds up, but as of now I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with oil in air filter and missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Update: Parts finally arrived, Generac sent no email regarding the status of the replacements, so I had no way of knowing if they were even shipping out parts. One more week and the pressure washer would have been returned. The pressure washer arrived covered in oil. The air filter was ruined from being filled with oil. This was likely a result of shipping, so I don't blame this on Generac. However, it also arrived without the four colored nozzles and some of the hardware. Generac's customer support has been very slow to respond to this and I've already lost customers waiting on a replacement air filter. Score to be updated if Generac ever ships me replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Initial thoughts
customer_reviews.text: Just received this haven't assembled or used it yet but it seems like a good quality machine. I did notice though the the 30' foot high pressure clear line that was listed in the description did not come with the machine. Instead received a 25' black high pressure hose...not sure if I received a different model than described in the details.
customer_reviews.author: Mav

customer_reviews.title: Both Amazon & Generac refuse to honor exchange for damaged power washer.  I would NOT recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT RECOMMEND !! Leaking fluid upon arrival. Both Amazon & Generac refuse to replace the power washer. It's been nothing but a headache. I would NOT recommend this power washer or any power washer from Generac. And AMAZON seriously dropped the ball here by not honoring their return policy.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Roller attachment is crap
customer_reviews.text: Roller attachment is crap a regular done spinner is 100 times more effective. But the power washer itself is good I own two including the push button start model. Unfortunately my first one had accident when I drove off with tail gate down.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Morgan

customer_reviews.title: We will see
customer_reviews.text: I have attempted to crank this machine 3 different times and nothing yet. I’m gonna call their support number. Thanks AKS
customer_reviews.author: Shappy

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: I found the power washer easy to use and it cleans well. Must be careful not to use the wrong attachment as it could take off paint. Like very much
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Great product reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: I use it to clean up my back yard and keep the boardwalk clean, they have some great attachments that do that really well, the machine works terrific but you cant keep it in the cold and start it right up, it must be kept in room temp to use it, no big deal I guess but they should still tell you that
customer_reviews.author: dvdblurayking

customer_reviews.title: Good Value and solid constiction
customer_reviews.text: Researched similar equipment and decided on General... Glad I did, perfect for home use - maybe even more powerful than required. Great value and though hard to pull starts with a couple pulls every time. Solid quality construction.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Had to return the first one because it quit working ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the first one because it quit working after just a few hours of use. The replacement washer has been used twice now and seems to really get the job done. The brush attachment is not as effective as it shows in the video.
customer_reviews.author: The Duncan Family

customer_reviews.title: Great machine.
customer_reviews.text: This has worked fantastic for me so far. Started easily. Worked amazingly. I cleaned the whole deck. Also the entire vinyl sided house. The concrete driveway. The boat. All of these all without needing cleaning detergent or chemicals. Be careful I blew a hole in my door screen.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth B.

customer_reviews.title: Check the crankcase before adding oil.
customer_reviews.text: First, this unit worked well on its first outing. However, I caution about adding the oil. My unit came in the box with oil in the crankcase. When I added oil as the instructions, labels, and tag plainly state, I ended up getting oil all over the place. I drained 22 oz. from the crankcase, replaced it with a pint, and the "dipstick" then indicated full. In an excess of caution, I pulled the sparkplug, but there was no oil in the cylinder. My gripe is that I spent an extra hour and a half messing with the unit and cleaning up the mess.
customer_reviews.author: Mack Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Worked good, but it came with a broken engine switch
customer_reviews.text: Worked good, but it came with a broken engine switch. For now you have to take the spark plug cable off to turn it off, which burns your hands because you rub against the very hot muffler. More updates to come.
customer_reviews.author: D. Boardman

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Work!
customer_reviews.text: Pressure Washer worked for About 10 minutes & cut off. First use! Can’t get help, not a returnable item!
customer_reviews.author: MAD DOG

customer_reviews.title: So upset
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as a Christmas present and he went to go use it and it doesn’t work. We can’t even return it and when we go to get it fixed they charge us even more for it. So upset.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied at all.
customer_reviews.text: This product does not get dirt or grime off very well it looks like i even washed anything. The dirt is still on what im trying to wash. Its a headache trying trying to get ahold of someone to help solve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect with plenty of power
customer_reviews.text: This is a great power washer! I read several reviews before purchasing and I honestly think some of the lesser reviews are from people who don't know how to use a power washer. 100% satisfied and highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Purchases in April of 2018, now here we are in August of 2019 with a broken power washer. For the money I would expect a more reliable product. Crossing my fingers I won’t run into any issues with the warranty since I purchased from Amazon but my advice is to avoid the headache and go with another product.
customer_reviews.author: HR

customer_reviews.title: High quality pressure washer and works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. High pressure. Does great job cleaning driveway and sidewalks and it was rather quick using the turbo head. The broom lets you do a wide area but the turbo head did a better job and was quick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly built
customer_reviews.text: Broke in the first hour using it. The cord snapped off, the rubber bushing fell off, water leaked all over. The pressure wash great though but this item was poorly built and I would not suggest this to anyone even if it was free.
customer_reviews.author: matt androsko

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and liked how it functioned. But within one week, the hose blew. After returning the power washer, I purchased another one. The second one was very difficult to start and would not stay running. Customer service refused to return item and gave me an incorrect number to call. I will never purchase another product from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J.C.

customer_reviews.title: A great power washer at a  Great price !
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific power washer ! This is the second one I bought unfortunately I I burnt out the first one because I didn’t realize that I had a crimp in Garden hose also the first power washer was at a lower psi . The second power washer works much better at the higher psi !
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for a good power washer
customer_reviews.text: Problem since the day it was delivered. Opened the box and all the nozzles were missing. Item didn't work straight out of the box. Called Generac and they said to take it to a Generac repair center that was 30 miles from my home. The place just called yesterday and said the motor is shot and a new unit should be delivered in 2-3 weeks. If you are looking for a good power washer, don't buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective Machine
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. It cranked on the first pull. It did an incredible job on my pool deck. I went to start it the next day and the pull start was seized up. I unscrewed the oil dipstick and gas and water poured out. I have since received a replacement, but haven't had a chance to use it.
customer_reviews.author: bwb 0530

customer_reviews.title: On off knob fell off.
customer_reviews.text: The on/off knob fell off. Extended warranty not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Spillane Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far......works great! Cleaned the concrete drive with no issues. The attachment makes it a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Great Pressure Washer
customer_reviews.text: I like all the features of this pressure washer. I like it so much better then my Ryobi 3100PSI. It's easy to start! I like how easy it is to attach the hoses. Perfect for all my car detailing needs, cleaning the house, driveway, walkway and pool deck and pool screen. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pressure washer works great, the hose not so well
customer_reviews.text: While pressure washing the washer works great. It is easy to start and runs flawlessly. However the hose for the pressure washer burst. There were no kinks in the hose. I turned around after finishing a spot on my garage floor and noticed the rubber casing on the hose was expanding after I depressed the trigger on the handle. I attempted to cut off the motor quickly, but not quick enough. Tough to use without a hose.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Speice

customer_reviews.title: One of the most trusted companies out there
customer_reviews.text: After researching power washers, this is the choice I made and it is a great choice. High quality, has features not found on other types of washers.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Swigart

customer_reviews.title: Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is not a review of the product. It arrived and did not work. It was a nonreturnable item, I assume because you have to put gas and oil in it, but Amazon support helped me out and made things right. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Would not run.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this pressure washer but it would just not stay running. Might have got 5 minutes use out of it. So I returned it. Still don’t understand why I had to pay $69 return shipping for something that didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: JulieAnn

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been pressure washing everything in sight! We are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Best Pressure Washer!!
customer_reviews.text: Product worked fantastic!!! Pressure washed my sidewalk and porch! Worked like a charm! Extremely quiet!
customer_reviews.author: WinkyB

customer_reviews.title: THE BOX CAME OPEN  WHEN ITS WAS BRAND NW  THIS IS DUE TO AMAZON NOT THE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: CALLED AMAMZON ABOUT IT AND GO OK WE WILL REFUND IT ANE JUST GIVE IT AWAY OR THROW OUT WHEN A MGM SAID THERE ISNT ANYTHING WE CAN DO !!!!! SOO MAD
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Beware of wearhouse deals
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived there was a piece missing ! The driveway cleaning brush was not in box. All other items were there !
customer_reviews.author: Larry G Smith

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful starts in one pull love it so far
customer_reviews.author: Rick B.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Used for a total of 4 hours then would not start after adding more gas. Retuned and bought a dewalt 4gpm 4400psi.
customer_reviews.author: J.W.J.D.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, has run like a champ with two large decks and also a teak chair. The brush attachment works well on concrete and on wood.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Works good just vibrates a lot.
customer_reviews.text: It has the pressure I wanted and works very well. I just have to put it on the dirt so it stays in place. If i put it on concrete it will start dancing around and go wherever it wants.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco G.

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Fired right up, had Damage to the thermal relief valve but was able to remove broken piece and repair
customer_reviews.author: franklincars

customer_reviews.title: Product works great.
customer_reviews.text: Product runs great. Cleared my cement patio really well. It was missing the broom attachment. Called Generac, and they sent me the part for free.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made wand / poor customer service.
customer_reviews.text: the power washer wand is cheaply made. I have not put oil or gas in the unit yet. while assembling the unit the end of the wand hit the floor when I placed it on hook that it is supposed to hang on and it broke where you connect the attachments at the end of the wand. I called customer support and told them and I have yet to receive a replacement yet. This rating is for the wand. Still have not used power washer.
customer_reviews.author: cashmosldr1

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and as powerful as advertised
customer_reviews.text: So easy to assemble and use. I love it! Cleaned the driveway in just hours with the broom type attachment. It looks awesome. Power is as good as advertised. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fast and free shipping, great product, works amazing! This product was cheaper than buying in store, plus it came with more features than the one in store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great once you get it started
customer_reviews.text: works great once you get it started. i have to use an ether sprayed into the intake to get it to start the first time each use.
customer_reviews.author: JohnB

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this Machine
customer_reviews.text: Works better than stated. I use it on level ground with no problems, works great on my driveway
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Patio scrubber
customer_reviews.text: I recieved exactly as described. Although I feel kind of dooped by the patio scrubber, it looks like it’s a scrubbing brush put it’s not, it’s a rail with 4 washing heads. I guess I’ll give it a shot and see how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Classy

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and broken
customer_reviews.text: Broke by third use. Its in the shop gettjng fixed, hope generac covers it :(
customer_reviews.author: Jam

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used it for 2 jobs. Performed well and I love the pressure dial
customer_reviews.author: On Point Cleaning, LLC

customer_reviews.title: Some Issues but Still Recommend...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that it was missing a pin that holds sprayer and the tubing melted in half on first use. Shipping was delayed twice. Works as expected, would recommend even though we had some issues.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Great for washing everything
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job of washing the vehicles, the patio and the sidewalk.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Poet

customer_reviews.title: Operation ease.
customer_reviews.text: Love this pressure washer. I already had your generator. Keep mfg. stuff. I love your brand.
customer_reviews.author: RLM

customer_reviews.title: PW great sweep accessory not so much
customer_reviews.text: This PW is great but the sweep accessory isn't very effective. PW 5 stars, accessory 1 star
customer_reviews.author: OrngUaVol?

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Can’t wait to clean my underwear with this. My four wheeler is spotless.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased in the condition it was shipped. I was worried about that from the reviews. It came with out oil in it so it could be put in it after it arrived. Very nice machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptable Performance
customer_reviews.text: Worst pressure washer. Would not start 1st use. Returned for replacement. Second one ran 20 minutes, sputtered, stopped and will not restart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great washer. Caution about shipping it.
customer_reviews.text: Pressure washer is great! I had issues with the shipping. Crankcase had some oil in it. It got turned on its side some time during shipping. There are no warning labels on the box. The air filter was full of oil.
customer_reviews.author: Ron H

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure washer.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pressure washer I have owned. The company is also top notch.
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of power and nice attachment heads
customer_reviews.text: This thing has the power to make short work of most any project. The special spinning head is a beast for cleaning, and the broom head works very well also. I just tried the soaper part of it to wash my cars and it made the job very easy. Just add car wash to the tank, switch the dial on the handle and it delivers a nice spray of wash on the car. I used a mitt to wash the car then switched the dial to rinse. Finished up with a soft drying towel and the car looked great.
customer_reviews.author: Garth

customer_reviews.title: Too many things wrong with it after hours of taking it out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I was very upset that if you have the foam blaster on, it will not siphon the cleaning chemicals. And when I opened the box it had a rivet, from the nozzle mount, sitting at the bottom of the box. And then the wand was damaged at the coupling to the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Webster

customer_reviews.title: keep the system on keeps turning off every time
customer_reviews.text: Having lots of difficult problem with this system keeps turning off every time I use the water trigger try everything to keep it on but nothing works, I would like to return this system back but I know it's impossible right now, I will need to get a new one but I don't know if I'm going to get it from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Unique Magic Cleaning Services, LLC

customer_reviews.title: Gas line not connected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Generac brand thinking it would be a high quality product. However, we placed everything per instructions, put in gas and it drained straight out of the bottom. My husband spent 45 minutes fixing the gas line that was not connected.
customer_reviews.author: RRW

customer_reviews.title: Bad pump no service
customer_reviews.text: Quit working after the first day. Company said water pressure issue. Water company said no chance of that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Use for household concrete, decking, vehicles, and off road vehicle cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Bill Wiles

customer_reviews.title: Works great and starts easily
customer_reviews.text: I would give this five stars but it took a month to get here. Works great and starts easily.
customer_reviews.author: MFuqua

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hose is a little short and hard to maneuver. Definitely need to upgrade it but for now it will do... ... good powerful machine. Having fun with it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Meza

customer_reviews.title: Pressure washer itself isnt damaged,but the delivery was horrible,also missing 1 part.
customer_reviews.text: Recieved the box,box was tore open on the side like it was dropped. Put pressure washer together and realized I'm missing a hook that holds the hose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Powerful Machine
customer_reviews.text: Great power washer. I took a while to learn how all the nozzles and settings worked, but once I figured it out it did a great job (gently) cleaning my vinyl siding and composite deck.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Radunzel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best power washer for the price for home use.
customer_reviews.author: SRK14

customer_reviews.title: The 3200 psi is great
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this machine is amazing. Its the best power washer we have ever had
customer_reviews.author: ashlyn fernandes

customer_reviews.title: The detachable or attachable broom is the best.
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and fast. A bit of learning to start. The detachable or attachable broom is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: It’s a lemon
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to find this but after starting it up it ran super rough. Surging and not produce much pressure at all. After about 15 min it died and I could not get it to start again. This pressure washer really is as bad as the bad reviews state.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Caprario

customer_reviews.title: Quality Matters
customer_reviews.text: Nice pressure washer. Many features and this thing is powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Owen

customer_reviews.title: Good Machine
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together started on second pull. Very powerful. Great Machine, runs great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Lengl

customer_reviews.title: SIPHONING DETERGENT
customer_reviews.text: THE SIPHON LINE FOR THE DETERGENT WORKED ONCE , DOES NOT SIPHON AT ALL !
customer_reviews.author: charles f.

customer_reviews.title: 🤙🏻
customer_reviews.text: Great power wash. The broom attachment actually works well. Just go slow
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome washer but was falling out of the box after shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

product_meta.title: Generac 7122 SpeedWash, 3200 PSI, Orange
product_meta.description: Generac's SPEEDWASH 7122 gas powered pressure washer provides you with a complete washing system featuring best-in-class cleaning power. This complete cleaning system includes a family of innovative cleaning attachments (power broom, turbo nozzle and soap blaster) to deliver better cleaning results in less time. The power broom attachment is equipped with high pressure nozzles to clean 4X faster than standard nozzles while the turbo nozzle attachment with rotating pinpoint stream is designed to remove stubborn dirt and grime off tough surfaces 30% faster than standard nozzles. The soap blaster attachment sprays soap 3X farther than a standard nozzle tip to penetrate tough stains and improve cleaning results.
feature_bullets: Clean smarter. Clean up to 50% faster.
Power Dial ergonomic spray gun allows you to easily adjust the pressure needed between four different tasks - car, wood, concrete and soap - at your fingertips
Attachments included: Turbo nozzle removes dirt and grime 30% faster, soap blaster sprays soap 3x farther and power broom for faster cleaning.
Generac 196cc OHV engine delivers maximum cleaning performance
Includes 25 feet high pressure flex hose (kink resistent, non-marring) and 4 quick-change nozzle tips: 0 Degree, 25 Degree, 40 Degree and soap

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars409 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
